Realistic sight for Pantsyr S1.

08-13-2023 : UPDATE => Following a desactivated special character by gaijin, reworking sight with new sign for TV screen.

Zip folder contain:
urss_pantsyr_s1 folder
2 versions of sight (V1 and V2)

Adapted for gun firing on WT: display distance correction.
Informations and the jauge on the right side are dynamic in the real optic. i did the choice fix them in a situation.

For install, look that tutoriel (English or french)
https://forum.warthunder.com/t/install-a-custom-sight/6915
https://forum.warthun...

A grid sight meant to figure out calibration data, such as parallax error.
The large, medium and small squares have edges 10, 5 and 1 thousandths long respectively.

Edit: this sight was made for my Steam guides submission about custom sights.

#calibration

A requested sight of Venti from Genshin Impact

There's a colored and default version. Colored is marked with an (_C)

#anime #alltanks #all_tanks

Historical Olifant Mk.1/Mk.1 Prototype commander view optic (for gunner sight)

#southafrica #south_africa #south_african #olifant_mk1 #olifant_mk_1a #olifant

[DDLC] Chibi Monika (Universal Sight)

Monika in chibi form! She will help ease your suffering and give you better accuracy.

Installation: Extract files to new folder (1), Copy all_tanks folder (2), paste in UserSights folder.

5 variations of the sight included, including different sizes. SketchUp files included.
This took at least 20 hours to make (multiple skill issues).
More monika posting planned!

Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/DDLC/comments/92kre5/updated_hd_monika_chibi_remade_for_reasons/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=web2x&context=3

#monika #justmon...
:clueless:

#dragon

Minimal Universal Tank Sight.

Large, Medium, and Small Text size, It's different for each tank.

If you want to change the size for a specific tank:

https://youtu.be/dUUZypRWXa4

↓Reticle Color changing instructions below↓
__________________________________________________

Installation:

Open your game files folder
Navigate to UserSights > all_tanks (Create them if you don't have them)
Put the .blk files from the downloaded ZIP directly into the all_tanks folder
Use the "Reload custom sights" keybind while in a round/test drive (Alt+...

This is M1 Abrams FCS sight style custom sight package with illuminate custom color crosshair.
Contained : All nation Tanks Universal Sight with Variation ( Only Line, Non text, Text )

How to use? : Download Zip file > put blk files in all_tanks folder

#sights #universal #alltanks

Ahh, salut again, people. It is me, your local pony skin maker that has made a completely different thing for my non-pony lovers. Introducing the Swedish sight pack.

This sights pack contains sights from @RideR2's library, adapted and made suitable for Swedish tanks. Of course, I also added a bunch of historically accurate gunsights for lower tier vehicles. Finally, this sight contains gunsights for all the Finnish vehicles (except for the AAs).
There are also going to be historically inaccurate sights in the pack, as I used my intuition for something like the 90mm found on the Ikv. The go...

This is M1 Abrams FCS sight style custom sight package with illuminate custom color crosshair.
Contained : T-80UM2

#sight #mochiapfsds

A sight for the Maus with distance markers for the secondary gun that go up to 500m. There is one sight for HE secondary rounds and one for HEAT secondary rounds, make sure you use the right sight for the type of ammo you are using because they don't have the same trajectory.

#maus

Another Twitch streamer sight.
Skye_Hime
There's a colored and default version. Colored is marked with an (_C)

Fixed line flickering on and around the gun.

#anime #alltanks #all_tanks

Localized sights for ZTZ96A and ZTZ96AP and PTL02 and WMA301 and ZTL11 and 99a,992,993，1001，Each tank has refined the bullet speed and bullet type，By the way, some bugs were fixed
适用于中国ztz96a和ztz96ap和02轮，11轮，301，99二期，99三期，99a的本土化瞄具，自制，每个坦克都对弹速和弹种名称进行了细化，顺便修复了一些bug。下面是使用视频:https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1KG4y1D7rX/?vd_source=41294bced15315b57d02943ac49db5c2

#alltanks #anime #vtuber #hololive #hololive_jp #shirakami_fubuki #shirakamifubuki #shirakami

Semi-realistic sight for modern Russian tanks (T-64 / T-72 / T-90 / T-80 / 2S25 Sprut all variants) by DaTux.

Goals

  • References points for quick targeting even without using the mouse wheel multiplier.
  • Relative speed reference points for shooting while moving / shooting moving targets with accuracy.
  • An easy way to estimate your target distance even without a laser rangefinder, using multiple stadiametric rangefinder.

Usage
See image attachments for a quick cheat sheet.

  • The central chevron represent the size...
